qa_multi_document_information_integratio.question: According to the hospitalization records of Newport General Hospital and Ashland General Hospital, what were the chief complaints of patients V. Lewis and L. Brown?

content: Chief Complaint: Fever, cough, and difficulty breathing for 5 days.
High fever, chills, and headache for 3 days

qa_multi_document_information_integratio.answer: According to the hospitalization records of Newport General Hospital, patient V. Lewis's chief complaint was fever, cough, and difficulty breathing for 5 days. According to the hospitalization records of Ashland General Hospital, patient L. Brown's chief complaint was high fever, chills, and headache for 3 days.

qa_multi_document_information_integratio.answer: According to the hospitalization records of Newport General Hospital, patient V. Lewis was preliminarily diagnosed with community-acquired pneumonia. According to the hospitalization records of Ashland General Hospital, patient L. Brown was preliminarily diagnosed with malaria.

qa_multi_document_information_integratio.answer: According to the hospitalization records of Newport General Hospital, patient V. Lewis is 64 years old. According to the hospitalization records of Ashland General Hospital, patient L. Brown is 32 years old.

qa_multi_document_information_integratio.answer: According to the hospitalization records of Newport General Hospital, patient V. Lewis is a retired teacher. According to the hospitalization records of Ashland General Hospital, patient L. Brown is a software engineer.

qa_multi_document_information_integratio.answer: According to the hospitalization records of Newport General Hospital, patient V. Lewis is Caucasian. According to the hospitalization records of Ashland General Hospital, patient L. Brown is also Caucasian.

qa_multi_document_compare.question: According to the hospitalization records of Newport General Hospital and Ashland General Hospital, who was admitted earlier, V. Lewis or L. Brown?
qa_multi_document_compare.answer: V. Lewis was admitted on July 23, and L. Brown was admitted on March 25. L. Brown was admitted earlier.
